title: STATEC: Euro Area Growth Outperforms Expectations, Luxembourg Shows Mixed Signals
description:
Euro area GDP in volume; Credit: Eurostat

On Wednesday 26 November 2025, STATEC published its latest economic update highlighting the resilience of activity in the euro area in the third quarter (Q3) of 2025, alongside mixed but overall positive signals for the Luxembourg economy.

title: European Commission Forecast: Luxembourg GDP Growth at 0.9% with Inflation Steady at 2.3%
description:

title: Luxembourg Unemployment Rate Drops to 5.9%
description:
Unemployment rate figures; Credit: STATEC

On Thursday 20 November 2025, Luxembourg's employment agency, ADEM, reported that there were 18,720 resident jobseekers available for work at the end of October 2025; the unemployment rate dropped from 6.1% back down to 5.9% over one month.
